meanings.definition: The state or quality of being milky.
meanings.sent1: The milkinesses of the sky at dawn were breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The milkinesses of the paint gave the room a soft glow.
meanings.sent3: The milkinesses of the water made it look like a giant glass of milk.
meanings.sent4: Her skin had a milkinesses that seemed to radiate purity.
meanings.sent5: The milkinesses of the clouds created a dreamy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The appearance or characteristic of having a milky color or texture.
meanings.sent1: The milkinesses of the liquid made it hard to distinguish its contents.
meanings.sent2: The milkinesses of the fabric made it feel soft and comforting.
meanings.sent3: The milkinesses of the glass made it look like it was filled with milk.
meanings.sent4: The milkinesses of the sky reminded her of a creamy dessert.
meanings.sent5: The milkinesses of the fog enveloped everything in a soft haze.
